response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I believe this is an opportunity not to be missed. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing it at this special offer price of $10,000. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier product.", "product_price": 10000}
